import { FunctionComponent, useEffect } from "react"; interface PrivacyPageProps {} const PrivacyPage: FunctionComponent = () => { useEffect(() => { document.title = "Rumble Worlds - Privacy Policy "; }, []); return (

Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy incorporates the practice and procedures of collecting, processing, storing, and protection of Personal Data obtained from the Users availing the Service of Motion Miracles Pte. Ltd. through Rumble Worlds at www.rumbleworlds.io.

BY USING THE SERVICE AND ACCESSING THE WEBSITE, YOU (INCLUDING, ANY ENTITY, PERSON OR A COMBINATION THEREOF ON WHOSE BEHALF YOU ARE ACTING) AGREE TO THE ENTIERTY OF THIS PRIVACY POLICY.

Under this Privacy Policy, certain terms will have the following specified meaning:

“User” means any natural person using the Service of Rumble Worlds, and whose personal data is collected and processed by the Rumble Worlds.

“GDPR Regulation” refers to the General Data Protection Regulation available at https://gdpr-info.eu/.

“Personal Data” refers to the set of data of the User mentioned specifically hereunder that the Rumble Worlds may collect under this Privacy Policy.

“Service” refers to the use of Rumble Worlds by the User.

“Rumble Worlds” means the Motion Miracles Pte. Ltd. through Rumble Worlds at www.rumbleworlds.io.


“Website” refers to the www.rumbleworlds.io, including any part thereof.

I. PERSONAL DATA AND INFORMATION

Rumble Worlds is the administrator of Personal Data provided by Users in connection with or during the course of using or availing the Service.

The Personal Data of the Users is collected, processed, stored, and protected pursuant to the applicable laws and regulations, including the GDPR Regulation, and in cases wherever required, with consent of the Users.

Rumble Worlds collects only the data that is necessary for functionality to conclude an agreement, and to conduct usage and analytical assessments, to provide the Service to the Users or any other person browsing the Website, and to provide updates by way of blogs and newsletters to the Users. General and Personal information we collect includes:

  • Email Address. ​


In the cases required by the provisions of the applicable laws and regulations, including the GDPR Regulation, the Users consent to collecting, processing, and storing of their personal data by the Rumble Worlds with the purposes to:

  • contact the Users by the Rumble Worlds;
  • enable use of the Service of Rumble Worlds; and ​
  • receive updates from the Rumble Worlds.


The Users may revoke their consent to the processing of personal data at any time by duly communicating the same to the Rumble Worlds.

​ It is voluntary for User to provide the information marked as required, however providing such information is necessary to conclude the agreement and for the use of Service. If the User does not provide the required personal data, and does not consent to collecting, processing and storage of personal data, it will not be possible for the Rumble Worlds to register an account in its system for such User, and to conclude an agreement and avail the Service. ​

The grounds for the Rumble Worlds to process personal data provided are:

    ​
  • the functionality requirements of the Service;
  • the need of Rumble Worlds to perform contractual obligations towards the Users; and
  • to take the necessary actions prior to entering into an agreement with the Users at the Users’ request.


​ For the marketing of the Service, and sending information on its offers or updates to the e-mail address(es) provided by the Users, the ground for processing of Users’ personal data is in pursuance of the legitimate interests of the Rumble Worlds.

​ In the case of providing newsletter or blog updates, the ground for processing of data is Users’ consent, which the Users may revoke at any time by duly intimating to the Rumble Worlds. ​

Users’ personal data will be stored in such form allowing for identification of the Users, and such storage will not be longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are collected and lawfully processed. After that time, data will be processed for the period necessary to resolve any potential disputes that may arise in connection with the Service, e.g. relating to claims (the period shall include the period of limitation of claims under the contract, in accordance with the provisions in force of the applicable law).

II. DISCLOSURE OF PERSONAL DATA

The Personal Data of Users may be disclosed to third parties by the Rumble Worlds only in the ways described hereunder:

  • to the affiliates of Rumble Worlds for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy;
  • to the third party or outside Rumble Worlds of the Rumble Worlds, who provide services which enable the functionality of Rumble Worlds, and other services such as data analysis, IT services, accounting and auditing services, marketing services, legal services;
  • to a third party in the event of any corporate transformation or reorganization, merger, sale, joint venture, assignment, transfer or other disposition of all or any portion of the business of Rumble Worlds, assets or stock (including in connection with any bankruptcy or similar proceedings).


Further, personal data can be disclosed to outside or third parties:

  • under applicable law(s), including laws outside your country of residence;
  • to comply with legal process, summons, subpoenas, discovery requests;
  • to respond to and/or comply with the requests from government authorities and other parties with legitimate interests, including law enforcement and government authorities outside the country of residence of Users, and to meet national security or law enforcement requirements;
  • to enforce the terms and conditions, and any other policy, agreement or contract of the Rumble Worlds;
  • to protect the operations of the Rumble Worlds, or any of its affiliates;
  • to protect the rights, privacy, safety or property of the Rumble Worlds, and/or that of its affiliates, the Users or others;
  • to allow the Rumble Worlds to pursue any legal remedies, actions, or recourses against the Users, or any other person.


Personal Data that the Rumble Worlds collects from the Users may be transferred to, and stored at, a place outside the European Economic Area. The Rumble Worlds will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that the Personal Data of the Users is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

III. DATA PROVIDED BY JOB APPLICANTS

Using the ‘Join Us’ or any similar option on the Website, the prospective applicants interested or desirous of working with Rumble Worlds can voluntarily submit personal information like name, email address, contact information of other social media handles like Discord, LinkedIn, etc., and/or copy of or links to their resume, curriculum vitae, or profile.

Such voluntarily submitted information shall not be subject to this Privacy Policy. It will be stored, accessed and internally circulated by the Rumble Worlds at its discretion towards various purposes including, without limitation, assessing the candidature, credentials and other information of the applicant, creating an internal repository and/or database of past and prospective applicants, conducting background check on the applicants, and such other purposes as Rumble Worlds is legally permitted to use.

IV. RIGHTS OF USERS

Users have the right to demand the access to their Personal Data, and the right to demand that the Personal Data be supplemented, updated, transferred, or their processing be limited, rectified, temporarily or permanently withheld from processing or deleted when data is incomplete, outdated, untrue or has been collected in breach of the law or if it is no longer necessary for the purpose for which they were collected.

Such demands or requests by the Users shall be duly communicated to the Rumble Worlds in a reasonable and official manner. The Rumble Worlds may refuse to delete personal data if the Users have violated the Terms & Conditions, User Agreement or other legal provisions in force, and it is necessary to retain the personal data in order to explain the circumstances of the breach and determine the Users’ liability, or assessing the extent of such breach and damages.

V. DATA OF OTHER PERSONS

If the Users enter any Personal Data of other persons, they are allowed to do so only under condition that applicable laws are not infringed, and such persons whose data are entered, have agreed and consented to the use of their personal information, and their rights are not violated.

Notwithstanding anything contained herein, the Rumble Worlds shall not be responsible, liable, or otherwise obligated to such persons in any manner whatsoever for the use of their data by the Client/User for any purpose, whether lawful or unlawful.

VI. USE OF COOKIES

The Rumble Worlds uses cookies or similar technologies to administer the Website, track Users’ movements around the Website, analyze and assess trends, and to gather information about the User base as a whole.

The Rumble Worlds uses cookies on the Website to:

  • improve Users’ experience on the Website;
  • maintain selected preference in Users’ Account(s);
  • understand and analyze the usage of the Website by Users; and
  • help identify the Users, and maintain their signed-in status.
Users may refuse to accept cookies by activating the setting on their browser which allows them to refuse the setting of cookies. However, if Users select this setting, they may not be able to access the whole or certain parts of the Website.

Unless the Users have adjusted their browser to refuse cookies, the Rumble Worlds system will issue cookies when the User logs on to its website.

The third party external websites to which the Rumble Worlds provides links (over which they have absolutely no control or influence of any sort whatsoever, and does not endorse their data protection practices) may also use cookies, and are not bound by the contents of this Privacy Policy. While accessing such third party external websites, the User is responsible to examine the individual Privacy Policies of such websites, and proceed accordingly.

VII. USE OF ANALYTICAL FEATURES

The Website uses Google Analytics which analyzes the Users’ (or any other person browsing the Website) behaviour, interaction, and usage of the Website, and generates various analytical and insightful reports. While doing so, the Google Analytics or any sub-feature of it generates information about the frequency, date, time, and place of the Users’ interaction with the Website, and their IP Addresses. All such information and final reports are used by Rumble Worlds in accordance with applicable laws and prevalent industry practices.

More information about Google Analytics can be obtained from www.analytics.google.com

Google Analytics provides the Users with an opt-out add-on browser extension which is available at https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=en. The use of this extension is at the absolute discretion of the Users.

VIII. MINORS

The Service is not directed to individuals under 16 years of age, and the Rumble Worlds does not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under 16. If the Rumble Worlds becomes aware that a child under 16 years of age has provided it with Personal Information, the Rumble Worlds will take steps to delete such information.

Service to a child under 16 years of age can only be provided with the prior consent and authorization of the person having parental responsibility over such child. However, to provide or decline to provide Service in such cases shall be at the sole and absolute discretion of the Rumble Worlds without assigning any reason(s) for providing or declining to provide Service.

IX. DATA PROTECTION MEASURES

Users’ Personal Data is kept secured against:

  1. being deliberately or intentionally made available to unauthorized person(s) or entity(ies);{" "}
  2. being accessed or taken over by any unauthorized person(s) or entity(ies);
  3. processed in breach of the applicable provisions; and
  4. altered, modified, lost, damaged or destroyed.

X. UPDATES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

Rumble Worlds reserves the absolute and unilateral right to modify or alter this Privacy Policy, or any part thereof, from time to time with or without notice to the Users or any other interested person(s).

Any such alteration(s) or modification(s) shall be effective immediately upon sending you notice of such alteration(s)/modification(s) by email at the respective email addresses of the Users.

Continued use of the Website and/or Service by the Users will be considered as consent to such changes in the Privacy Policy. If the Users desire to opt-out, they can do so by not using the Website and Service, and contacting the Rumble Worlds about the same.

XI. CONTACT

The designated email address at which Users may contact Rumble Worlds is at legal@rumbleworlds.io with ‘Privacy Policy’ as prefix in the subject line of the email.

Users may contact the Rumble Worlds at any time with queries to obtain information on whether and how the Rumble Worlds uses or intends to use their personal information, to report any events affecting the security of information and its transfer; or to revoke the Users’ consent to collecting and processing of personal information.

); }; export default PrivacyPage;
